findings.title: Front-running
findings.description: The LosslessWrappedERC20 contract may be vulnerable to front-running attacks, where attackers can observe pending withdrawal requests, specifically in the requestWithdraw function, and manipulate transactions before they are executed.

findings.title: Overwriting Pending Withdrawal Requests
findings.description: In the LosslessWrappedERC20 contract, when users request a withdrawal using the requestWithdraw function, there is no check for an existing pending withdrawal request. As a result, users can overwrite a previous request, potentially leading to unexpected behavior and loss of funds.
